a11y.question: What is Accessibility checker?
a11y.answer: Discover accessibility issues without having to open the browser's console. See logs in a toast notification format and find out issues you didn't know existed.

a11y.question: How do I activate my subscription?
a11y.answer: We use the email your logged into Google Chrome or your browser with. If you used a different email then your billing. Just contact us.

a11y.question: How do I login ?
a11y.answer: We use the email your logged into Google Chrome or your browser. Suppose you need to update your email. Just contact us.

a11y.question: Do I need a student email for the student pricing
a11y.answer: Yes, we are doing the honour system here. We will follow up to ask for confirmation you are a student.

a11y.question: Can we cancel at any time?
a11y.answer: There's no minimum contract for Helperbird â€” cancel at any time without penalty or hassle. If you prepaid for a year, we'll refund any unused months. To cancel, open up the app, go to the subscription option, and click cancel.

a11y.question: Why are we charging for this?
a11y.answer: The $6.99 per month is to support the cost of the development of new and upcoming features. We also do a yearly subscription for $60.00 as this is a one-person team.

a11y.question: What browsers does Helperbird run on?
a11y.answer: Currently Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox and Edge. Coming soon on macOS Safari extension and iPad.

a11y.question: I have a suggestion!
a11y.answer: Excellent I would love to hear about it! Email robert.gabriel@helperbird.com with your suggestion.

a11y.question: Does Helperbird and OpenDyslexic work on Google Docs?
a11y.answer: Yes! Google Docs currently doesn't support some fonts like OpenDyslexic. So we built CSS and support for these fonts.

a11y.question: What if I have more questions?
a11y.answer: We'd be happy to answer them.
